subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Vancouver goalie Roberto Luongo made 26 saves in the Canucks’ 3-2 victory over the host Capitals last night. In other games:¶Drew Stafford’s fluke goal with 8:48 left helped visiting Buffalo end a three-game losing streak, 4-2 against Florida. ¶Valtteri Filppula scored his first goal of the season as Detroit beat visiting San Jose, 5-1.¶Montreal scored five power-play goals, four in the first period, and won its third straight game, 7-4 against host Carolina.
